Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at Racine/74th
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
